mapper.sql: t.accountId as accountId , t.accountName as accountName , t.uuid as uuid , t.certId as certId , t.customerId as customerId , t.custNo as custNo , t.status as status , t.source as source , t.createTime as createTime , t.updatedTime as updatedTime , t.realNameTime as realNameTime , t.isOld as isOld , t.active as active , t.inviteCode as inviteCode , t.operator as operator , t.location as location , t.prodid as prodid , t.openid as openid , t.inviteAcode as inviteAcode , t.inviteRcode as inviteRcode , t.utmMedium as utmMedium , t.utmCampaign as utmCampaign , t.registerId as registerId , t.appType as appType , t.isNew as isNew , t.lable as lable , t.md5Mobile as md5Mobile , t.tenant_id as tenantId , t.proId as proId , t.wechatType as wechatType , t.proCertIdMD5 as proCertIdMD5 , t.proMobileMD5 as proMobileMD5 , t.proMobileCertId as proMobileCertId
mapper.insert:
insert into t_account
accountId,
accountName,
uuid,
certId,
customerId,
custNo,
status,
source,
createTime,
updatedTime,
realNameTime,
isOld,
active,
inviteCode,

openid,

inviteRcode,
utmMedium,
utmCampaign,
registerId,
appType,
isNew,
lable,
md5Mobile,
tenant_id,
proId,
wechatType,
proCertIdMD5,
proMobileMD5,
proMobileCertId,

mapper.update:
update t_account
accountId = ${symbol_pound}{accountId},
accountName = ${symbol_pound}{accountName},
uuid = ${symbol_pound}{uuid},
certId = ${symbol_pound}{certId},
customerId = ${symbol_pound}{customerId},
custNo = ${symbol_pound}{custNo},
status = ${symbol_pound}{status},
source = ${symbol_pound}{source},
createTime = ${symbol_pound}{createTime},
updatedTime = ${symbol_pound}{updatedTime},
realNameTime = ${symbol_pound}{realNameTime},
isOld = ${symbol_pound}{isOld},
active = ${symbol_pound}{active},
inviteCode = ${symbol_pound}{inviteCode},
operator = ${symbol_pound}{operator},
location = ${symbol_pound}{location},
prodid = ${symbol_pound}{prodid},
openid = ${symbol_pound}{openid},
inviteAcode = ${symbol_pound}{inviteAcode},
inviteRcode = ${symbol_pound}{inviteRcode},
utmMedium = ${symbol_pound}{utmMedium},
utmCampaign = ${symbol_pound}{utmCampaign},
registerId = ${symbol_pound}{registerId},
appType = ${symbol_pound}{appType},
isNew = ${symbol_pound}{isNew},
lable = ${symbol_pound}{lable},
md5Mobile = ${symbol_pound}{md5Mobile},
tenant_id = ${symbol_pound}{tenantId},
proId = ${symbol_pound}{proId},
wechatType = ${symbol_pound}{wechatType},
proCertIdMD5 = ${symbol_pound}{proCertIdMD5},
proMobileMD5 = ${symbol_pound}{proMobileMD5},
proMobileCertId = ${symbol_pound}{proMobileCertId},
where accountid = ${symbol_pound}{accountid}
